description: Try our easy to follow Chicken & Pesto Pizza In 3 Easy Steps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Meat pizza,Seafood free,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Tomato,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Chicken & Pesto Pizza In 3 Easy Steps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs basil pesto mozzarella & cashew dip

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the Jase’s Pizza Base with Red Rock Deli Basil Pesto Mozzarella & Cashew Dip. Arrange the Primo Pulled Chicken and cherry tomatoes on top of pizza. Scatter with Perfect Italiano Perfect Pizza to evenly cover base.

Place the pizza in the oven for 10-15 minutes or until the cheese is melted and base is crispy. Remove from the oven, sprinkle over fresh basil leaves and serve immediately. Note: Primo Pulled chicken packs are 150g but divided into two – so 75g used for recipe.
